channel.title: Smoke, snow and other screen effects
channel.description: I am new to servers and recently made one. I had my server up and running and in the chat box Weather Changed and 11 hours 40 minutes kept flooding the chat box. I restarted the server and smoke was on the screen. I used ::nosnow but that only works with individual people and it doesn't even work for some people. I'm wondering if there is a folder where I can take it out? Help would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Smoke, snow and other screen effects
item.dc:creator: @newyorkowns newyorkowns
item.description:
@newyorkowns wrote:

The Her0:

Fixed, thank you very much

np if u have any questions feel free to ask =]
